sentence: Ya está abierta la 2ª fase de admisión para la preinscripción a los Másteres universitarios que oferta la UPCT para el próximo curso académico 2023/24.
translation: The 2nd phase of admission for pre-registration for the university master's degrees offered by UPCT for the next academic year 2023/24 is now open.

sentence: La preinscripción se puede realizar hasta el 26 de junio, a las 14:00 horas.
translation: Pre-registration can be done until June 26, at 14:00 hours.

sentence: La lista provisional de admitidos se publicará el 3 de julio y la lista definitiva de admitidos se conocerá el 5 de julio.
translation: The provisional list of admitted students will be published on July 3rd and the final list of admitted students will be known on July 5th.

sentence: La UPCT oferta el próximo curso 27 másteres y cinco doble máster.
translation: UPCT offers 27 master's degrees and five double master's degrees next academic year.

sentence: Respecto al acceso de estudiantes internacionales, aquellas personas cuya lengua materna no sea el español, deben acreditar un nivel B2 (CEFR) de español.
translation: Regarding the access for international students, those whose mother tongue is not Spanish must demonstrate a B2 level (CEFR) of Spanish.

sentence: Deben aportar un certificado incluido en la tabla ACLES o realizar la prueba de nivel del Servicio de Idiomas de la UPCT.
translation: They must provide a certificate included in the ACLES table or take the language level test from the UPCT Language Service.

sentence: La matrícula online se puede formalizar del 6 al 12 de julio (23,59 horas local).
translation: Online enrollment can be done from July 6th to 12th (local time 23:59).
